curation_notes: Top-level entrypoints and governance documents for Workflow Cookbook agents. Update after reshaping index.json or governance flows.

nodes.reason: Bootstrap instructions and repository map for any new agent run.
Central hub describing automated task fan-out and coordination model.
Mandatory behavior guardrails and operational constraints for all automations.
System-level contracts and IO definitions referenced across specs and tasks.
Standard operating procedures for execution and validation flows.
Acceptance criteria and QA scope for releases and automation outputs.
Forward-looking scope, milestones, and in-flight specifications.
Guardrails-facing entrypoint for Birdseye usage, links, and escalation steps.
Machine-readable adjacency map backing all Birdseye lookups.
